text: Sensitivity can mean: Psychology: * Highly sensitive person Science: * Sensitivity (biology) * Sensitivity (electronics) * Sensitivity (human) * Sensitivity (information) * Sensitivity (tests, medicine) * Sensitivity (radio receiver) * Sensitivity analysis Finance: * For sensitivity in finance, see beta coefficient and Greeks (finance) Music: * "Sensitivity" is also a song by R&B; singer, Ralph Tresvant
title: Sensitivity
